name: Alpine Corporation TEC116 Outdoor Aged Green Pedestal Birdbath with Scrollwork, 28" Tall, Green
short_description: STUNNING BIRDBATH: The Alpine 28" Tall Birdbath features an elegant scrollwork design, adding charm to your garden, patio, deck, or yard while attracting feathered friends.
SHALLOW SHAPE: Shallow and wide bowl assures that multiple small birds can drink and bathe safely at the same time
BEAUTIFUL DESIGN: Luxurious and antique styling adds a touch of elegance to your garden or yard
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Polypropylene material resists rust and damage from the elements while the quality base prevents the birdbath from tipping over.
IDEAL SIZE: Birdbath measures 20" L x 20"W x 28"H, the ideal size for your yard, and includes a one-year manufacturer's support from the date of purchase.
product_description: The Alpine Corporation 28" Tall Outdoor Birdbath with Scrollwork Decoration is a beautiful and functional addition to your garden, patio, or yard. Designed to attract feathered friends, this birdbath features an elegant scrollwork design and a soft green finish, creating an enchanting focal point for your outdoor space. Whether you're a nature enthusiast or simply love the peaceful presence of birds, this birdbath offers a perfect spot for birds to drink, bathe, and play. Crafted from durable polypropylene, this birdbath is designed to withstand the elements, ensuring lasting performance in all weather conditions. The shallow and wide bowl is ideal for small birds to bathe and drink safely, encouraging frequent visits from a variety of bird species. The quality base provides stability, preventing the birdbath from tipping over, even on windy days. At 28" tall, this birdbath is the ideal size for a variety of outdoor spaces, from small gardens to larger yards or patios. Its timeless design, with its antique-inspired detailing, blends seamlessly into any setting, whether placed near your pool, on the deck, or in the garden. The Alpine Birdbath with Scrollwork also pairs beautifully with bird feeders to create a vibrant, bird-friendly oasis in your yard. Measuring 20"" L x 20"" W x 28"" H, the birdbath is a welcoming addition to your outdoor decor, providing a tranquil space for birds to gather. It’s easy to maintain, simply refill with water and enjoy the peaceful sight of birds coming to bathe and drink. With a 1-year manufacturer's support, you can trust in the quality and durability of your purchase. Create a peaceful and inviting environment for both you and the birds with the Alpine Corporation 28" Tall Outdoor Birdbath. An ideal way to enhance your outdoor space, this birdbath offers charm, elegance, and function, transforming your yard into a birdwatcher’s paradise. Alpine Corporation is one of America's leading designers, importers, and distributors of superior quality home and garden decor products. Alpine Corporation's award winning in-house design team continuously develops new and innovative "statement pieces" for your home and garden. Your indoor and outdoor living spaces will be the envy of the neighborhood with our wide assortment of fresh, fashionable and contemporary products, from beautifully crafted solar garden stakes featuring patented motion and fiber optic lighting technology to beautiful fountains and delightful bird baths and feeders.

name: Backyard Expressions Outdoor Garden Bird Bath - Bronze - Weather Resistant Polyresin - 27 Inch
short_description: Weather-Resistant Build: Premium PP material with a protective finish resists rain, sun, and temperature changes.
Sturdy Base: Equipped with three ground stakes for added stability, with an option to fill the base with gravel or sand.

product_description: The spacious 20-inch basin provides ample room for multiple birds to drink, splash, and play, creating a lively hub of activity in your outdoor sanctuary. Maintenance is a breeze with the smooth basin surface, allowing for quick and easy cleaning to keep the water fresh and inviting. Assembly is simple and hassle-free, with the bowl securely attaching to the pedestal via a reliable screw mechanism. Available in three elegant finishes—Bronze, Green, and Blue—this bird bath effortlessly complements any outdoor décor while remaining an eco-friendly choice with its sustainable materials. Bring charm, tranquility, and vibrant birdlife to your garden with this thoughtfully designed bird bath, a perfect blend of beauty and functionality.

name: Alpine Corporation - 25" Tall Outdoor Birdbath with Planter Yard Statue, Green – Stunning Garden Accent to Attract Birds - Durable Polypropylene Construction for Patio, Deck, or Yard
short_description: Elegant Outdoor Birdbath: Add charm to your garden with this 25-inch tall birdbath. Its natural green finish blends amazingly into outdoor spaces, and the wide bowl attracts birds, creating a tranquil atmosphere perfect for birdwatchers and nature lovers.

Shallow Bowl for Birds: Designed with a wide shallow bowl, this birdbath provides a safe and inviting spot for birds to drink and bathe. Its thoughtful design minimizes water waste and encourages frequent visits, making it a delightful garden focal point.

Multifunctional Base: The built in planter in the birdbath’s base allows you to add colorful flowers or greenery, enhancing your garden’s beauty. This versatile design combines style and functionality for a personalized outdoor centerpiece.

Durable & Weather Resistant: Crafted from sturdy polypropylene, this birdbath resists rust, UV damage, and fading. Its stable base prevents tipping, even in windy conditions, making it a reliable and long addition to any outdoor space.

Compact & Easy to Maintain: At 15"L x 15"W x 25"H, this birdbath fits perfectly in gardens or patios. The simple design ensures quick maintenance—just refill with fresh water. Backed by a 1 year support, it offers peace of mind.
product_description: Beckon feathered friends to your yard with the Alpine Corporation Birdbath with Planter. Fill the bath with fresh water and enjoy watching all the birds congregate near your patio, garden, deck, yard, or pool! This high-quality birdbath features a gorgeous polypropylene design with space to plant flowers at the base — great for adding an extra touch of beauty to your outdoor decor. It is perfect for pairing with a bird feeder to coax a variety of birds outside your window during any season. The sturdy base keeps the birdbath from tipping over while the plastic construction withstands weather changes. Your yard will be the delight of humans and winged creatures alike! With a 1-year warranty, you can be confident in the quality of your purchase. Birdbath measures 15"L x 15"W x 25"H for use in yards of any size. name: Bird Baths for Outdoors Heavy Duty, 38.5 in Detachable Birdbaths for The Garden Clearance, Bird Bath Bowl Spa & Birdfeeder with Metal Stake Stand for Outdoors Garden, Circle Style (Brown)
short_description: Easy Installation $ Detachable Design: The bird bath bowl can be removed and cleaned by unscrewing the wing screws; you do not need to pull the entire stand up to clean the bowl.

Sturdy Bird Bath: The bottom of the triangular iron plates which makes the whole bird bath stand more stable. Heavy duty metal stakes provide strong support for this bird bath, keeping it upright and firmly in the soil of the yard.

Circle Shape Bowl: Our bowl use a unique design which is suitable for smaller-sized birds. You don't have to worry about the height of the bowl being so deep that the bird will drown. In addition, you can use it as a bird feeder.

Upgraded Metal Screw Hole: We have improved our process, our screw holes are made of copper, which can support you to repeatedly remove the bowl for cleaning many times. Other brands use plastic screw holes. Due to repeated use, the plastic screw holes will be deformed and loosened, which will result in failure to lock.
Great Present for Your Garden: This bird bath is a great gift for your garden. It can be a nice decor for your yard.

name: Sunnydaze 21" H Ceramic Bird Bath for Outside - Hand-Painted Outdoor Bird Bath Bowl, UV/Frost-Resistant Finish - Galaxy Blue - Classic Pedestal
short_description: LARGE WATER CAPACITY: This pedestal bird bath measures 18" in diameter x 21" H. The bowl measures 18" in diameter (16" inner) x 4" H with a 1.5" bowl depth. The base measures 10.5" in diameter x 18.5" H. The inner base diameter measures 9" at the bottom and 3.5" at the top. The hollow interior has a height of 17.75". The bird bath weighs 38.2 lbs and holds 1 gallon of water.

STRONG AND STURDY: This outdoor bird bath is made from durable ceramic with a mineral glaze finish for long-lasting beauty. This bird bath is resistant to weather, UV rays, and frost. Please note, variations in color may occur due to manual glazing and the unique kiln firing process.

STYLISH OUTDOOR ACCENT: This ceramic glazed bird bath for outdoors can be placed on the patio, in the yard, or in the garden for a beautiful outdoor accent. It features a wide, shallow bowl which makes it easy for a variety of birds to preen and bathe.
EASY 2-PIECE ASSEMBLY: This garden bird bath can be assembled in minutes. Simply align the grooves under the bowl with the notches of the pedestal and twist the bowl clockwise to lock it in place.
WORRY-FREE PURCHASING: Sunnydaze Decor backs its products with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty.

name: Pedestal Bird Bath for Outside, Modern Bird Bath with Tree Art Decor, 13'' Dia Metal Birdbath Bowl & Feeder for Garden, Lawn, Yard

Durable Material: The outdoor bird bath is made of metal, and it is weather-resistant, durable, and not prone to cracking or collapse. The smooth surface is not only coated with an anti-rust coating but also easy to clean, providing a long-lasting and refreshing oasis for bird friends

2-in-1 Design: The bird bath for outside is not only designed with a 13-inch birdbath bowl but also a 5.9-inch seed tray. This birdbath and bird feeder combination design can attract more birds to come and eat and drink water, adding vitality to the garden

Stable Structure: The multifunctional bird bath adopts a stable triangular stand design, which can be flexibly moved to the deck, patio, garden, or lawn. For enhanced stability, it is equipped with 3 U-shaped forks to ensure that the birdbath remains upright and firm on your lawn

Widely Used: The birdbaths for outdoors can not only attract birds to bathe and eat but also can be placed in a birdbath fountain to keep the water flowing, forming a wonderful landscape. It can also be designed as a bonsai and placed on the terrace or deck for people to enjoy
